name: planted.filetwürfel
description: Pre-marinated steak cubes with aromatic herbs and spices. Perfect for fajitas.
longDescription: Bring Mexican flavors to your kitchen with our planted.filetwürfel A La Mexicana. These delicious steak cubes come pre-marinated with an aromatic blend of herbs and spices, making meal prep a breeze. Simply pan-fry with fresh vegetables for fajitas, or add them to salad bowls for a protein-packed meal.
ingredients: Water, soy protein (30%), rapeseed oil, Mexican spice blend (cumin, chili, oregano, garlic), natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Pan-fry for 3-4 minutes with sliced peppers and onions. Serve in warm tortillas with salsa, guacamole, and sour cream.

steps.title: Prep
steps.description: Slice peppers and onions. Get the tortillas ready.

steps.title: Fry
steps.description: Hot pan, 3-4 min with veggies. Quick and hot.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Warm tortillas, salsa, guac. Fajita night.
